emuInput.TitMainTitle: Marian Anderson wearing military uniform with hat and overcoat, standing in snow with trees in background, possibly Oakland
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 22, 1945 reads: "A Wave - Just when the cold wave his Pittsburgh, Marian Anderson of the Waves came home to spend her leave. She doesn't seem to mind that blanket of snow which she found covering the City of Pittsburgh...and we don't mind her presence here. - Harris Photo."
